verbs.description: Attendees at the National Rifle Association ’s annual meeting in Dallas [V: ca] n't carry their firearms when Trump and Pence speak Friday .
[ARG0: Attendees at the National Rifle Association ’s annual meeting in Dallas] [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: carry] [ARG1: their firearms] [ARGM-TMP: when Trump and Pence speak Friday] .
Attendees at the National Rifle Association ’s annual meeting in Dallas ca n't carry their firearms [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: Trump and Pence] [V: speak] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] .
